slider.title: Gadgets|Apple iPad 2
slider.alt: Apple is back with iPad 2. Thinner. Lighter. Faster. FaceTime. Smart Covers. 10-hour battery.

slider.title: Gadgets|Razer Deathadder
slider.alt: Razer launches Deathadder black edition. Black is back.

slider.title: Movies|Transformers 2
slider.alt: Battle: Los Angeles set to release on 03.11.2011. Its gonna be a epic battle.

slider.title: Gadgets|Motorola Xoom
slider.alt: The first Android 3.0 tablet arrives to challenge the iPad 2. Motorola Xoom is finally here.

slider.title: Gadgets|Razer Switchblade
slider.alt: Razer recently introduced Switch Blade concept design. It surely is gonna be revolution in gaming.

slider.title: Gadgets|Motorola Atrix
slider.alt: Motorola officially announced its new android smartphone Motorola Atrix 4G Android. Its gonna be one heck of a phone.
